text: @realDonaldTrump How many dead protesters are enough to satisfy your sickness?  For that matter, how many dead coronavirus victims will satisfy you?  Your handling of each of the crises of your presidency are either stupefyingly ignorant or horrendously evil.  Total failure as a human!
